imdb.plot outline: BAE NIGHT Tony (Genji Jacques) and Alexus (Sandra Justice) appear to be the typical married couple that is envied by many. They have class, culture, and wealth. Tony is a handsome, caring, devoted husband and a savvy businessman who runs an upscale real-estate company marketing suburban homes. Alexus is a vibrant, free spirited socialite and stylist who is obsessed with social media. She spends her time running her Instagram page Miami Glamour. Although the couple seem to have it all together, things are not what they seem for the Robinson's A web of lies, and deceit begin to tear into their marriage. Bad decisions and Secrets from the past begin to resurface leading to betrayal and turmoil. Will Tony and Alexus fight to overcome their obstacles, and restore their marriage, or will they allow their circumstances to destroy it?
imdb.title: Bae Night
